geom_split_violin

Source: R/geoms.R
geom_split_violin.Rd

create a split violin geom

Usage

geom_split_violin(
  mapping = NULL,
  data = NULL,
  stat = "ydensity",
  position = "identity",
  ...,
  draw_quantiles = NULL,
  trim = TRUE,
  scale = "area",
  na.rm = FALSE,
  show.legend = NA,
  inherit.aes = TRUE
)

Arguments

mapping

Set of aesthetitc mappings, Default: NULL

data

Data to display, Default: NULL

stat

Statistic to plot, Default: 'ydensity'

position

Position, Default: 'identity'

...

extra arguments

draw_quantiles

Quantiles to draw, Default: NULL

trim

Trim ends?, Default: TRUE

scale

Analogous to violin scale, Default: 'area'

na.rm

Default: FALSE

show.legend

Default: NA

inherit.aes

Default: TRUE
